info.title: FastAPI + Mongo Starter
info.description: Training track service — v1 API surface.

get.description:
A simple read-only endpoint to verify the app is alive.
Returns a tiny JSON document; safe to call without auth.

post.description:
Create a new user account.

- **email**: User email (must be unique)
- **password**: Password (min 8 characters)
- **name**: User's full name

New users are created as **student** by default.
Admins can promote users to tutor/admin roles using admin endpoints.

Returns a JWT token and user info on success.

Authenticate user and receive JWT token.

- **email**: User email
- **password**: User password

Returns a JWT token and user info on successful authentication.

get.description:
List all contact form submissions.

Admin only.

Returns a list of all contact forms sorted by most recent first.

schema.title: Response List Contact Forms Api V1 Contact Forms Get

post.description:
Submit a new contact form.

Anyone can submit a contact form.

- **name**: Submitter's name
- **email**: Submitter's email
- **subject**: Contact form subject
- **message**: Contact form message

Returns the created contact form on success.

delete.description:
Delete a contact form submission.

Admin only.

- **form_id**: The ID of the contact form to delete

Returns 204 No Content on success.

get.description:
Get all course categories.

No authentication required - anyone can read course categories.

Returns:
    List of all course categories.

schema.title: Response Get All Categories Api V1 Course Categories Get

post.description:
Create a new course category.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    request: Category creation request with name and description
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Returns:
    Created course category.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If name already exists or validation fails.

get.description:
Get a specific course category by ID.

No authentication required - anyone can read course categories.

Args:
    category_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string

Returns:
    Course category details.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If category not found.

put.description:
Update a course category.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    category_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string
    request: Update request with optional name and/or description
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Returns:
    Updated course category.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If category not found, validation fails, or name already exists.

delete.description:
Delete a course category.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    category_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Raises:
    HTTPException: If category not found.

schema.title: Response Delete Category Api V1 Course Categories  Category Id  Delete

Raises:

No authentication required - anyone can read job roles.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:

Raises:

delete.description:
Delete a job role.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:

schema.title: Response Delete Job Role Api V1 Job Roles  Job Role Id  Delete

get.description:
Get all vendors.

No authentication required - anyone can read vendors.

Returns:
    List of all vendors.

schema.title: Response Get All Vendors Api V1 Vendors Get

post.description:
Create a new vendor.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    request: Vendor creation request with name, description, and optional logo
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Returns:
    Created vendor.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If name already exists or validation fails.

get.description:
Get a specific vendor by ID.

No authentication required - anyone can read vendors.

Args:
    vendor_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string

Returns:
    Vendor details.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If vendor not found.

put.description:
Update a vendor.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    vendor_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string
    request: Update request with optional name, description, and/or logo
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Returns:
    Updated vendor.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If vendor not found, validation fails, or name already exists.

delete.description:
Delete a vendor.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    vendor_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Raises:
    HTTPException: If vendor not found.

schema.title: Response Delete Vendor Api V1 Vendors  Vendor Id  Delete

get.description:
Get courses with optional filters and pagination.

No authentication required - anyone can read courses.

Query Parameters:
    category_id: Optional course category ID
    level: Optional course level (BEGINNER, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED, EXPERT)
    language: Optional course language
    certifications: Optional list of certification names to filter by
    job_role_ids: Optional list of job role IDs to filter by
    vendor_ids: Optional list of vendor IDs to filter by
    skip: Pagination offset (default 0)
    limit: Pagination limit (default 20, max 100)

Returns:
    List of courses matching the filters.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If level is invalid.

parameters.name: level

schema.description: Filter by course level (BEGINNER, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED, EXPERT)
schema.title: Level

parameters.description: Filter by course level (BEGINNER, INTERMEDIATE, ADVANCED, EXPERT)

parameters.name: certifications

schema.description: Filter by one or more certifications
schema.title: Certifications

parameters.description: Filter by one or more certifications

parameters.name: job_role_ids

schema.description: Filter by one or more job role IDs
schema.title: Job Role Ids

parameters.description: Filter by one or more job role IDs

parameters.name: vendor_ids

schema.description: Filter by one or more vendor IDs
schema.title: Vendor Ids

parameters.description: Filter by one or more vendor IDs

post.description:
Create a new course.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    request: Course creation request with all details
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Returns:
    Created course.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If title already exists or validation fails.

get.description:
Get a specific course by ID.

No authentication required - anyone can read courses.

Args:
    course_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string

Returns:
    Course details.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If course not found.

put.description:
Update a course.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    course_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string
    request: Update request with optional fields
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Returns:
    Updated course.

Raises:
    HTTPException: If course not found, validation fails, or title already exists.

delete.description:
Delete a course.

**Admin only** - requires valid JWT token with admin role.

Args:
    course_id: MongoDB ObjectId as string
    _: Admin role requirement (validates JWT token and role)

Raises:
    HTTPException: If course not found.

schema.title: Response Delete Course Api V1 Courses  Course Id  Delete

Get assignments for current user.

Requires student or higher role.

Requires tutor or admin role.

Requires authentication.

List submissions for current user.

Requires student or higher role.

Submit an assignment.

get.description:
List all users in the system.

Admin only.

schema.title: Response List Users Api V1 Users Get

post.description:
Create a new tutor account.

Admin only.

- **email**: Tutor email (must be unique)
- **password**: Password (min 8 characters)
- **name**: Tutor's full name

Returns tutor account details on success.

Admin only.

schema.title: Response Get System Statistics Api V1 Analytics System Stats Get

Export reports (CSV, PDF, etc.).

schema.title: Response Export Report Api V1 Analytics Export  Report Type  Get
